name: Carrousel Side Table - Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection
description: Part of the Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection. Inspired by gentle natural shapes, this side table is enhanced with a high-gloss black lacquer finish, creating a surface that reflects light gracefully. The Carrousel side table is found in many rooms and suites and can be placed near an armchair or sofa, serving as either a side table or nightstand.
